verses.verse: Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> (for he was the firstborn; <S%H1060><s%> but for as much as he defiled <S%H2490><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> bed, <S%H3326><s%> his birthright <S%H1062><s%> was given <S%H5414><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and the genealogy <S%H3188><s%> is not to be reckoned <S%H3187><s%> after the birthright. <S%H1062><s%>

For Judah <S%H3063><s%> prevailed <S%H1396><s%> above his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and of him came the chief <S%H5057><s%> ruler; <S%H5057><s%> but the birthright <S%H1062><s%> was Joseph's: <S%H3130><s%>)

The sons, <S%H1121><s%> I say, of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were, Hanoch, <S%H2585><s%> and Pallu, <S%H6396><s%> Hezron, <S%H2696><s%> and Carmi. <S%H3756><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joel; <S%H3100><s%> Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Gog <S%H1463><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Shimei <S%H8096><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Micah <S%H4318><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Reaia <S%H7211><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Baal <S%H1168><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>

Beerah <S%H880><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Tilgathpilneser <S%H8407><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> carried <S%H1540><s%> away <S%H1540><s%> captive: <S%H1540><s%> he was prince <S%H5387><s%> of the Reubenites. <S%H7206><s%>

And his brothers <S%H251><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> when the genealogy <S%H3188><s%> of their generations <S%H8435><s%> was reckoned, <S%H3187><s%> were the chief, <S%H7218><s%> Jeiel, <S%H3273><s%> and Zechariah, <S%H2148><s%>

And Bela <S%H1106><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azaz, <S%H5811><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shema, <S%H8087><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joel, <S%H3100><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in Aroer, <S%H6177><s%> even to Nebo <S%H5015><s%> and Baalmeon: <S%H1186><s%>

And eastward <S%H4217><s%> he inhabited <S%H3427><s%> to the entering <S%H935><s%> in of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> from the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates: <S%H6578><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> their cattle <S%H4735><s%> were multiplied <S%H7235><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>

And in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> they made <S%H6213><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> with the Hagarites, <S%H1905><s%> who fell <S%H5307><s%> by their hand: <S%H3027><s%> and they dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in their tents <S%H168><s%> throughout <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the east <S%H4217><s%> land of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> over <S%H5048><s%> against <S%H5048><s%> them, in the land <S%H776><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> to Salcah: <S%H5548><s%>
Joel <S%H3100><s%> the chief, <S%H7218><s%> and Shapham <S%H8223><s%> the next, <S%H4932><s%> and Jaanai, <S%H3285><s%> and Shaphat <S%H8202><s%> in Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

And their brothers <S%H251><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> were, Michael, <S%H4317><s%> and Meshullam, <S%H4918><s%> and Sheba, <S%H7652><s%> and Jorai, <S%H3140><s%> and Jachan, <S%H3275><s%> and Zia, <S%H2127><s%> and Heber, <S%H5677><s%> seven. <S%H7651><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the children <S%H1121><s%> of Abihail <S%H32><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Huri, <S%H2359><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jaroah, <S%H3386><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Michael, <S%H4317><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeshishai, <S%H3454><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jahdo, <S%H3163><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Buz; <S%H938><s%>
Ahi <S%H277><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abdiel, <S%H5661><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Guni, <S%H1476><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers. <S%H1><s%>

And they dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in Gilead <S%H1568><s%> in Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> and in her towns, <S%H1323><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> of Sharon, <S%H8289><s%> on their borders. <S%H8444><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> these were reckoned <S%H3187><s%> by genealogies <S%H3187><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jotham <S%H3147><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> and the Gadites, <S%H1425><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> of valiant <S%H2428><s%> men, <S%H582><s%> men able <S%H5375><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> buckler <S%H4043><s%> and sword, <S%H2719><s%> and to shoot <S%H1869><s%> with bow, <S%H7198><s%> and skillful <S%H3925><s%> in war, <S%H4421><s%> were four <S%H702><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and three score, <S%H8346><s%> that went <S%H3318><s%> out to the war. <S%H6635><s%>
And they made <S%H6213><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> with the Hagarites, <S%H1905><s%> with Jetur, <S%H3195><s%> and Nephish, <S%H5305><s%> and Nodab. <S%H5114><s%>

And they were helped <S%H5826><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them, and the Hagarites <S%H1905><s%> were delivered <S%H5414><s%> into their hand, <S%H3027><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that were with them: for they cried <S%H2199><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> in the battle, <S%H4421><s%> and he was entreated <S%H6279><s%> of them; because <S%H3588><s%> they put their trust <S%H982><s%> in him.

And they took away <S%H7617><s%> their cattle; <S%H929><s%> of their camels <S%H1581><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> thousand, <S%H505><s%> and of sheep <S%H6629><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> thousand, <S%H505><s%> and of asses <S%H2543><s%> two thousand, <S%H505><s%> and of men <S%H5315><s%> <S%H120><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

For there fell <S%H5307><s%> down <S%H5422><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> slain, <S%H2491><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the war <S%H4421><s%> was of God. <S%H430><s%> And they dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in their steads <S%H8478><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the captivity. <S%H1473><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in the land: <S%H776><s%> they increased <S%H7235><s%> from Bashan <S%H1316><s%> to Baalhermon <S%H1179><s%> and Senir, <S%H8149><s%> and to mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon. <S%H2768><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> were the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> even Epher, <S%H6081><s%> and Ishi, <S%H3469><s%> and Eliel, <S%H447><s%> and Azriel, <S%H5837><s%> and Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> and Hodaviah, <S%H1938><s%> and Jahdiel, <S%H3164><s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of valor, <S%H2428><s%> famous <S%H8034><s%> men, <S%H582><s%> and heads <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers. <S%H1><s%>

And they transgressed <S%H4603><s%> against the God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> and went a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> destroyed <S%H8045><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

And the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> stirred <S%H5782><s%> up the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Pul <S%H6322><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria, <S%H804><s%> and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Tilgathpilneser <S%H8407><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria, <S%H804><s%> and he carried <S%H1540><s%> them away, <S%H1540><s%> even the Reubenites, <S%H7206><s%> and the Gadites, <S%H1425><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them to Halah, <S%H2477><s%> and Habor, <S%H2249><s%> and Hara, <S%H2024><s%> and to the river <S%H5104><s%> Gozan, <S%H1470><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
